thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hareon Solar Tech Takes Measures To Lower Costs As Shares Closed Below Face Value

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hareon Solar Tech Takes Measures To Lower Costs As Shares Closed Below Face Value

organizations.name: reuters) - hareon solar technology co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Hareon Solar Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT IS TAKING MEASURES TO ADJUST STRUCTURE AND LOWER COSTS AFTER ITS SHARES CLOSED BELOW FACE VALUE AT 0.97 YUAN ($0.1541) PER SHARE ON FEB 1 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nrYPvX Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2935 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
